name: piano-typing-game
description: A piano typing game built with Electron

scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "cross-env ELECTRON=true vite" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env ELECTRON=true NODE_ENV=development electron-forge start"
scripts.electron:package: cross-env ELECTRON=true vite build && electron-forge package
scripts.electron:make: cross-env ELECTRON=true vite build && electron-forge make
scripts.make:linux: cross-env ELECTRON=true vite build && electron-forge make --platform linux
scripts.make:portable: cross-env ELECTRON=true vite build && electron-forge make --target @electron-forge/maker-zip
